project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file. The program will calculate and display the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Implement the function to read a CSV file and extract numerical columns specified by the user.
Implement the function to calculate the mean of numerical columns.
Implement the function to calculate the median of numerical columns.
Implement the function to calculate the mode of numerical columns.
Implement the user input interface for selecting columns.
Write tests for each of the functions implemented above.
Execute tests on all implemented functions to ensure that they function correctly.
